name: Test Users Table Insertion
sql: INSERT INTO Users (username, password, email) VALUES ('test_user', 'password123', 'test@example.com');
rationale: Verifies that a user can be successfully added to the Users table.

name: Test Unique Constraint on Username
sql: INSERT INTO Users (username, password, email) VALUES ('test_user', 'password123', 'another@example.com');
rationale: Ensures that inserting a duplicate username raises an error due to the unique constraint.
